item.author: nathan@gdquest.com (Nathan Lovato)
item.description: Never heard of Krita? It is a free, open source digital painting program that used to be Linux-only. Since 2 years though, there’s a Windows version, and the program is now being ported to Mac. Krita 3 is a major update to an already powerful application. It brings it to a whole new level. It ships with a new rendering engine, a traditional animation toolset, an overhauled layers docker, rulers, grid, guides, snapping support, and a brand-new tablet code, which supports more Wacom alternatives.
